testCase.name: Testing POST on /api/availability It should respond with 200 status code
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should update fakeAvailability1 status
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should update fakeAvailability2 status
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should put to 'confirmed' orderlines related to product 1
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should put to 'confirmed' the order status
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should put to 'failed' the order status
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should put to 'waitingForCharge' the order status
Testing PUT on /api/availabilities It should decrement the user wallet
Testing GET on /api/availability/:farmerid?date= It should respond with an array of availabilities
Testing GET on /api/availability/:farmerid?date= It should respond with a 200 status code
Testing GET on /api/availability/:farmerid?date= It should respond with a 404 status code

Testing POST on /login It should respond with 401 (Unauthorized) status code Case of wrong password
